div.bibl: Krasnow Scrapbooks, Vol. II, owned by Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N. Broadway, Chicago, Ill. PARADE, PLAY, CONCERT AND DANCE OF RUSSIAN INDEPENDENT SOCIETY OF ST. GEORGE THE CONQUEROR

body.p: This society held a parade on May 19, 1928. After the parade the play, "Buvalshchina," was given, followed by a concert in which the chorus of the Union of Russian Youth and that of the society took part. This was followed by a dance.
The proceeds went to their school and the newspaper Svobodnaya Rossiya (Free Russia).
